name: chirag-portfolio
description: Personal portfolio website built with Next.js, React, and Nextra showcasing professional experience, projects, technical skills, and contributions

scripts.clean: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name '.next' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name '.turbo' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name 'package-lock.json' -type f -delete && find . -name 'yarn.lock' -type f -delete && find . -name 'pnpm-lock.yaml' -type f -delete && find . -name 'bun.lockb' -type f -delete && find . -name 'bun.lock' -type f -delete
scripts.setup: npm run clean && npm install && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run check-types
scripts.add-skills: npx skills add https://github.com/vercel-labs/agent-skills --skill vercel-react-best-practices && npx skills add https://github.com/vercel-labs/agent-skills --skill web-design-guidelines && npx skills add https://github.com/giuseppe-trisciuoglio/developer-kit --skill shadcn-ui
